data.tweet: Chelsea saw more of the ball, completing 444 passes to Leeds United's 253.
sentences: Chelsea completed 444 passes.
Leeds United completed 253 passes.

data.tweet: Chelsea completed 31 passes into the final third, while Leeds United managed 23.
sentences: Chelsea managed to play an impressive 31 successful balls into the final third.
Leeds United successfully played 23 balls into the final third.

data.tweet: Chelsea completed 74 long balls (74% completion rate), while Leeds United managed 33 (48%).
sentences: Chelsea completed 74 long balls.
Leeds United completed 33 long balls.
Chelsea completed an impressive 74% of the passes they played long.
Leeds United completed 48% of the passes they played long.

data.tweet: Chelsea controlled possession, taking 668 touches to Leeds United's 477.
sentences: Chelsea took 668 touches of the ball.
Leeds United took 477 touches of the ball.

data.tweet: Marc Cucurella successfuly completed 67 passes (more than any other player on the pitch). Thiago Silva completed 91% of his attempted passes.
sentences: Marc Cucurella completed an impressive tally of 67 passes.
Marc Cucurella completed more passes than any other player on the pitch.
91% of Thiago Silva's passes found a teammate.

data.tweet: Thiago Silva had the highest passing accuracy of any Chelsea player.
sentences: Thiago Silva had the highest passing accuracy of any Chelsea player.

data.tweet: Marc Cucurella played more passes into the final third than any other player on the pitch (eight), followed by Kalidou Koulibaly, who completed six passes into final third.
sentences: Marc Cucurella successfully played 8 balls into the final third.
Marc Cucurella successfully played more balls into the final third than any other player on the pitch.
Kalidou Koulibaly successfully played 6 balls into the final third.
Kalidou Koulibaly successfully played the second most balls into the final third the second most times of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Kalidou Koulibaly made 633 yards worth of progressive passes, more than anyone else on the pitch. The game's next most progressive passer was Thiago Silva who successfully passed the ball 470 yards towards the opponent's goal.
sentences: Thiago Silva passed the ball a total of 470 yards towards the opponents goal.
Kalidou Koulibaly passed the ball a total of 633 yards towards the opponents goal.
Kalidou Koulibaly passed the ball farther towards the opponents goal than any other player on the pitch.
Thiago Silva passed the ball second farthest towards the opponents goal of any player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Marc Cucurella carried the ball a total of 192 yards towards the opponent's goal - farther than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Marc Cucurella managed to carry the ball an impressive 192 yards towards the opponent's goal.
Marc Cucurella carried the ball farther towards the opponent's goal than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Thiago Silva made more clearances (five) than any other player on the pitch.
sentences: Thiago Silva made five clearances.
Thiago Silva made more clearances than any other player on the pitch.

data.tweet: Thiago Silva won six aerial duels (more than any other player on the pitch), while Kalidou Koulibaly won three.
sentences: Thiago Silva won six aerial duels.
Thiago Silva won more aerial duels than any other player on the pitch.
Kalidou Koulibaly won three aerial duels.
Kalidou Koulibaly won the second most aerial duels of any Chelsea player.
